Data.title: How ‘Should’ Makes Us Stupid — And How to Get Smart Again
Data.description: When we say we ‘should’ do something, we frame our goal in a way that makes change less likely. Here’s how to motivate differently.

Data.description: It’s getting tiring, being a woman in tech. And today, on international women’s day, I want to explain why.
